snippet: "Game of Thrones," which is adapted from George R. R. Martin's best-selling "Song of Ice and Fire" novels, was a breakout hit in its first season and is off to a strong start in Season 2.
abstract: "Game of Thrones," which is adapted from George R. R. Martin's best-selling "Song of Ice and Fire" novels, was a breakout hit in its first season and is off to a strong start in Season 2.

headline.main: HBO Orders a Third Season for 'Game of Thrones'
